model.minimaxAB.dataobjects

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.minimaxAB.dataobjects.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The main class of the Game 2048.
    Author:
    Tzelon Machluf and Jasmine Nouriel based on Vasilis Vryniotis minimax algorithm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BOARD_SIZE
      The size of the board
      static int MINIMUM_WIN_SCORE
      The theoretical minimum win score until the target point is reached
      static int TARGET_POINTS
      The maximum combination in which the game terminates
